summary: This is experimental but it basically works. Managed to place several custom follower mods in Enderal. Theyre basically NPC replacers. In order to make them into followers they must be force recruited by using the Extensible Follower Framework mod except for Sofia. All NPCs will use regular Skyrim non Enderal apparel mods.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Sofia and Friends in Enderal

[/size] 
[size=3]This is experimental but it basically works. These are just PATCHES, the original NPC/Follower mods are REQUIRED. Managed to place several popular custom follower mods in Enderal. They're basically NPC replacers. The NPCs replaced are the non-relevant patrons of The Drunken Bee tavern in Riverville. In order to make them into followers they must be force-recruited by using the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]Extensible Follower Framework mod[/url], all except for Sofia. All the NPCs will use regular Skyrim, non-Enderal apparel mods (a lot are available here on Nexus so choose some & acquire the gear via console or use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AddItemMenu[/url].) 

[img]http://i.imgur.com/dePymtn.jpg[/img]

[youtube]vzCVlPg9bQ8[/youtube]


NPCs (As mentioned, all NPCs are located inside The Drunken Bee tavern in Riverville):
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*Again, the mods I did are just PATCHES. ORIGINAL follower mods are REQUIRED.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54527/?]Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower by John Jarvis and Christine Slagman[/url] 
- Sofia replaces one of the generic patrons. Sofia can be recruited using her regular follower interface but upon progressing with the recruitment dialogue.. a [/size]DOPPELGANGER (Double)[size=3] is spawned. RECRUIT THE SPAWNED DOPPELGANGER INSTEAD OF THE FIRST SOFIA. Not fully tested but Sofia will have most of her regular custom follower features. Install the main mod first then install the patch after it. 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61140/?]Toccata Follower by rxkx22 and Kasprutz and cloudedtruth[/url]
- Toccata replaces the Drunken Bee's Bard - Liliath. She retains Liliath's voice & habits. She roams around so she's not always inside the tavern (sometimes she's in the market.) She can be recruited by using EFF. Install the main mod first then install the patch after it. [/size]*Recommend to install non-scripted version.[size=3]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68976/?]Vivace Follower by rxkx22 and cloudedtruth[/url] 
- Vivace replaces one of the Drunken Bee's patrons. She retains the patron's voice & habits. She can be recruited by using EFF. Install the main mod first then install the patch after it. 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37869/?]Chaconne Follower by rxkx22[/url]
- Chaconne replaces one of the Drunken Bee's patrons. She retains the patron's voice & habits. She can be recruited by using EFF. Install the main mod first then install the patch after it. 

*Recommend to install non-hdt bodies on NPCs, like basic UNP or CBBE.
*Although demo depicts Emily /Babydoll & Recorder to be included as d[/size]irect edit of the main plugin worked,[size=3] replicating a patch didn't. I apologize for this. 

[/size]
Credits: 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54527/?]Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower by John Jarvis and Christine Slagman[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61140/?]Toccata Follower by rxkx22 and Kasprutz and cloudedtruth[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68976/?]Vivace Follower by rxkx22 and cloudedtruth[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37869/?]Chaconne Follower by rxkx22[/url]
author: AerysTMD
